title: Wear Sound Meter
summary: Measure your atmosphere noise from your wrist
developerAddress:
American University of Sharjah
POBox 26666 Key 128
description: Wear Sound Meter is an app for Android Wear devices that measures the noise volume in decibels (db) using your watch built-in microphone and displays it neatly in real timeSupports both Round and Square Android Wear watchesYou can also calibrate the app manuallyAfter installing, you will not see any icon on your phone menu. The application will automatically sync to your watch (it may take time).Please note that some devices are limited to a specific volume level, for example Huawei Watch is limited to around 80 db. Therefore the application will not measure any volume beyond that
descriptionHTML:
Wear Sound Meter is an app for Android Wear devices that measures the noise volume in decibels (db) using your watch built-in microphone and displays it neatly in real time

Supports both Round and Square Android Wear watches

You can also calibrate the app manually

After installing, you will not see any icon on your phone menu. The application will automatically sync to your watch (it may take time).

Please note that some devices are limited to a specific volume level, for example Huawei Watch is limited to around 80 db. Therefore the application will not measure any volume beyond that
comments: Useless I have a calibrated mic and smaart. This app is upwards of 30db off almost always.
Thanks for your reply! You can calibrate it with the plus and minus! Perfect.
